title: Angular frequency of pendulum in elevator

content.question: A simple pendulum of length <math alttext="L sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> is attached to the ceiling of an elevator which is moving upwards and slowing at a constant rate of <math alttext="g over 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mi>g</mi><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math>. While the elevator is slowing down, the pendulum bob is released from a small angle displacement from its equilibrium position and oscillates. What is the angular frequency of oscillations of the pendulum while the elevator is slowing down?

choices.label: <math alttext="the square root of the fraction g over 3 L sub 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msqrt><mfrac><mi>g</mi><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></math>

<math alttext="the square root of, the fraction 2 g over 3 L sub 0, end square root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of, times the fraction g over L sub 0, end square root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mfrac><mi>g</mi><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mfrac></msqrt></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the square root of, the fraction 4 g over 3 L sub 0, end root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the square root of, the fraction 2 g over 3 L sub 0, end square root" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>g</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><msub><mi>L</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></mrow></mfrac></msqrt></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
